purpose: Enable users to easily opt out of having their content used for AI training.
principle: Utilizes known tags and settings like robots.txt to signal AI systems to exclude certain content from training datasets.
reusability: Can be integrated into any web platform or content management system to ensure compliance with opt-out requests.
limitations: Effectiveness depends on AI systems respecting the opt-out signals; not enforceable across all platforms.
name: ai-training-opt-out
description: Known tags and settings suggested to opt out of having your content used for AI training.
highlight: Provides a standardized way to opt out of AI training using known tags and settings.
